mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, BR_ID, BR_NM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, DB_SCH_ID, DB_SCH_PNM, DBC_TBL_NM, DBC_COL_NM, BIZ_AREA_ID, BIZ_AREA_LNM, BR_CRGP_USER_ID, BR_CRGP_USER_NM, AGR_NV, GL_NV, USE_YN, TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, TGT_DB_SCH_ID, TGT_DB_SCH_PNM, TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, TGT_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
CNT_SQL, ER_CNT_SQL, ANA_SQL, TGT_CNT_SQL, TGT_ER_CNT_SQL, TGT_ANA_SQL
mapper.insert:
insert into WAQ_BR_MSTR
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO,
BR_ID,
BR_NM,
DB_CONN_TRG_ID,
DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
DB_SCH_ID,
DB_SCH_PNM,
DBC_TBL_NM,
DBC_COL_NM,
BIZ_AREA_ID,
BIZ_AREA_LNM,
BR_CRGP_USER_ID,
BR_CRGP_USER_NM,
AGR_NV,
GL_NV,
USE_YN,
TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID,
TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM,
TGT_DB_SCH_ID,
TGT_DB_SCH_PNM,
TGT_DBC_TBL_NM,
TGT_DBC_COL_NM,
TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM,
TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL,
TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
CNT_SQL,
ER_CNT_SQL,
ANA_SQL,
TGT_CNT_SQL,
TGT_ER_CNT_SQL,
TGT_ANA_SQL,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT coalesce(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) ,
#{brId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIM(UPPER(#{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIM(UPPER(#{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TRIM(UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TRIM(UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{bizAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIM(UPPER(#{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{brCrgpUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{brCrgpUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agrNv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{glNv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtDbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{tgtKeyDbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtKeyDbcColVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tgtVrfJoinCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{erCntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{anaSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{tgtCntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{tgtErCntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{tgtAnaSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_BR_MSTR
BR_ID = #{brId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BR_NM = #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(#{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_SCH_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(#{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
DBC_TBL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
DBC_COL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
BIZ_AREA_ID = #{bizAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIZ_AREA_LNM = TRIM(UPPER(#{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
BR_CRGP_USER_ID = #{brCrgpUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BR_CRGP_USER_NM = #{brCrgpUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGR_NV = #{agrNv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GL_NV = #{glNv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{tgtDbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TGT_DB_SCH_ID = #{tgtDbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_SCH_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TGT_DBC_TBL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TGT_DBC_COL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(#{tgtDbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM = #{tgtKeyDbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL = #{tgtKeyDbcColVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD = #{tgtVrfJoinCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNT_SQL = #{cntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
ER_CNT_SQL = #{erCntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
ANA_SQL = #{anaSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
TGT_CNT_SQL = #{tgtCntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
TGT_ER_CNT_SQL = #{tgtErCntSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
TGT_ANA_SQL = #{tgtAnaSql,jdbcType=CLOB},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.BR_ID, A.BR_NM, A.RQST_DCD
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, A.DB_SCH_ID, A.DB_SCH_PNM, A.DBC_TBL_NM, A.DBC_COL_NM, A.BIZ_AREA_ID, A.BIZ_AREA_LNM, A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID, A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM, A.AGR_NV, A.GL_NV, A.USE_YN, A.CNT_SQL, A.ER_CNT_SQL, A.ANA_SQL, A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, A.TGT_DB_SCH_ID, A.TGT_DB_SCH_PNM, A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM, A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD, A.TGT_CNT_SQL, A.TGT_ER_CNT_SQL, A.TGT_ANA_SQL, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, B.DQI_ID, B.DQI_LNM, C.CTQ_ID, C.CTQ_LNM , (CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END ) AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAQ_BR_DQI_MAP B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO LEFT OUTER JOIN WAQ_BR_CTQ_MAP C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO

SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_PNM ,DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,CONN_TRG_LNK_URL ,CONN_TRG_DRVR_NM ,DB_CONN_AC_ID ,DB_CONN_AC_PWD ,DBMS_TYP_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE 1=1 AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB_CONN_TRG_Id = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set A.VRF_CD = '4' --검증전 ,A.RVW_STS_CD = '0' --검토전 where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = (select B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID from WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B where B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and a.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(B.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM)) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set A.BIZ_AREA_ID = (select B.BIZ_AREA_ID from WAM_BIZ_AREA B where 1=1 and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and A.BIZ_AREA_LNM = TRIM(UPPER(B.FULL_PATH)) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update WAQ_BR_DQI_MAP A set A.DQI_ID = (select B.DQI_ID from WAM_DQI B where 1=1 and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and A.DQI_LNM = TRIM(UPPER(B.FULL_PATH)) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_BR_CTQ_MAP A set A.CTQ_ID = (select B.CTQ_ID from WAM_CTQ B where 1=1 and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and A.CTQ_LNM = TRIM(UPPER(B.FULL_PATH)) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CTQ_LNM IS NOT NULL

update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID = ( select B.USER_ID from WAA_USER B where B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and (TRIM(UPPER(A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM)) = TRIM(UPPER(B.USER_NM)) OR TRIM(UPPER(A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM)) = TRIM(UPPER(B.USER_ID)) ) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM IS NOT NULL

update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = (select B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID from WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B where B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and a.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = TRIM(UPPER(B.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM)) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM IS NOT NULL

update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set (A.REG_TYP_CD , A.BR_ID , A.OBJ_VERS , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.BR_ID) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END ,MAX(B.BR_ID) AS BR_ID ,CASE WHEN MAX(B.OBJ_VERS) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(B.OBJ_VERS) END AS OBJ_VERS , coalesce(MAX(B.FRS_RQST_DTM), A.RQST_DTM) AS FRS_RQST_DTM , coalesce(MAX(B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID), A.RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_BR_MSTR B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.BR_NM = A.BR_NM ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set (A.BIZ_AREA_ID , A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , A.BR_ID) = (select B.BIZ_AREA_ID, B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, B.BR_ID from WAM_BR_MSTR B where B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and B.BR_NM = A.BR_NM ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD'
mapper.insert: and A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' --검증쿼리 and exists (select 1 from WAM_BR_MSTR D where D.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and A.BR_NM = D.BR_NM and coalesce(A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID, '▦') = coalesce(D.BR_CRGP_USER_ID, '▦') and coalesce(A.USE_YN, '▦') = coalesce(D.USE_YN, '▦') and coalesce((SELECT DQI_ID FROM WAQ_BR_DQI_MAP WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND BR_ID = A.BR_ID), '▦') = coalesce((SELECT DQI_ID FROM WAM_BR_DQI_MAP WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND BR_ID = A.BR_ID), '▦') and coalesce((SELECT CTQ_ID FROM WAQ_BR_CTQ_MAP WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND BR_ID = A.BR_ID), '▦') = coalesce((SELECT CTQ_ID FROM WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND BR_ID = A.BR_ID), '▦') and coalesce(A.OBJ_DESCN, '▦') = coalesce(D.OBJ_DESCN, '▦') and coalesce(A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, '▦') = coalesce(D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, '▦') and coalesce(A.BIZ_AREA_ID, '▦') = coalesce(D.BIZ_AREA_ID, '▦') and coalesce(A.DBC_TBL_NM, '▦') = coalesce(D.DBC_TBL_NM, '▦') and coalesce(A.DBC_COL_NM, '▦') = coalesce(D.DBC_COL_NM, '▦') AND DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(A.CNT_SQL,1000) = DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(D.CNT_SQL,1000) AND DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(A.ANA_SQL,1000) = DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(D.ANA_SQL,1000) and coalesce(A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, '▦') = coalesce(D.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, '▦') and coalesce(A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, '▦') = coalesce(D.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, '▦') and coalesce(A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM, '▦') = coalesce(D.TGT_DBC_COL_NM, '▦') and coalesce(A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, '▦') = coalesce(D.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, '▦') and coalesce(A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, '▦') = coalesce(D.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, '▦') -- and A.TGT_CNT_SQL = D.TGT_CNT_SQL -- and A.TGT_ANA_SQL = D.TGT_ANA_SQL )
--검증쿼리 and exists (select 1 from WAQ_BR_MSTR D where A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO and A.BR_NM = D.BR_NM and A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
and A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' --검증쿼리 and not exists (select 1 from WAM_BR_MSTR D where D.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and A.BR_NM = D.BR_NM )
mapper.update: update WAQ_BR_MSTR A set A.VRF_CD = (select case when coalesce(MAX(B.RQST_SNO), 0) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '2' -- 1: 등록가능 2: 검증오류 END from WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS B where B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO and B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.BIZ_AREA_ID IS NULL

INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,coalesce(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM ${tblnm} A INNER JOIN WAQ_BR_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} --검증쿼리 and B.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.DQI_ID IS NULL

INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,coalesce(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM ${tblnm} A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAQ_BR_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} --검증쿼리 and B.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CTQ_LNM IS NOT NULL and A.CTQ_ID IS NULL
--검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID IS NULL
--검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM IS NOT NULL and A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM IS NOT NULL AND 1 < ( SELECT B.CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(B.USER_ID) AS CNT , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAA_USER B ON TRIM(UPPER(A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM)) = TRIM(UPPER(B.USER_NM)) WHERE B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} group by A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, B.USER_NM ) B WHERE A.RQST_NO= B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO )
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.BR_CRGP_USER_NM IS NOT NULL

--검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and not exists (select 1 from WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH SC ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = SC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND SC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND SC.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL T ON SC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = T.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND SC.DB_SCH_ID = T.DB_SCH_ID AND SC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND SC.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d')
WHERE DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = SC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(T.DBC_TBL_NM)) )

--검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and not exists (select 1 from WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH SC ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = SC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND SC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND SC.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL T ON SC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = T.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND SC.DB_SCH_ID = T.DB_SCH_ID AND SC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND SC.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d')
INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_COL C ON T.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND T.DBC_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = SC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(T.DBC_TBL_NM)) AND A.DBC_COL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(C.DBC_COL_NM)) )

and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and (A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_CNT_SQL IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_ANA_SQL IS NOT NULL OR A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL ) and (A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM IS NULL OR A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM IS NULL OR A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM IS NULL OR A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL IS NULL OR A.TGT_CNT_SQL IS NULL OR A.TGT_ANA_SQL IS NULL OR A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL )

--검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM IS NOT NULL and not exists (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR D INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON D.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL T ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = T.DB_CONN_TRG_ID
WHERE DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(T.DBC_TBL_NM)) AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO )

--검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM IS NOT NULL and not exists (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR D INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON D.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL T ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = T.DB_CONN_TRG_ID
INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_COL C ON T.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND T.DBC_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM = TRIM(UPPER(C.DBC_COL_NM)) AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_BR_MSTR
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND coalesce(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: , BR_NM ,DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_SCH_ID, DBC_TBL_NM, DBC_COL_NM , BIZ_AREA_ID, BR_CRGP_USER_ID, AGR_NV, GL_NV, USE_YN, CNT_SQL, ER_CNT_SQL , ANA_SQL, TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TGT_DB_SCH_ID, TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, TGT_DBC_COL_NM , TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD, TGT_CNT_SQL, TGT_ER_CNT_SQL, TGT_ANA_SQL , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_BR_MSTR A SET (BR_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.BR_ID AS BR_ID , coalesce(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_BR_MSTR B WHERE B.BR_ID = A.BR_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_BR_MSTR B WHERE B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.BR_NM = A.BR_NM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_BR_MSTR A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.BR_NM = A.BR_NM )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_BR_MSTR A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.BR_NM = A.BR_NM )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WAQ_BR_MSTR (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, BR_ID, BR_NM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, DB_SCH_ID, DB_SCH_PNM, DBC_TBL_NM, DBC_COL_NM, BIZ_AREA_ID, BIZ_AREA_LNM, BR_CRGP_USER_ID, BR_CRGP_USER_NM, AGR_NV, GL_NV, USE_YN, CNT_SQL, ER_CNT_SQL, ANA_SQL, TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, TGT_DB_SCH_ID, TGT_DB_SCH_PNM, TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, TGT_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, TGT_CNT_SQL, TGT_ER_CNT_SQL, TGT_ANA_SQL, RQST_DCD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo} , (SELECT coalesce(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo}) + ROWNUM , A.BR_ID, A.BR_NM, A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, A.DB_SCH_ID, S.DB_SCH_PNM, A.DBC_TBL_NM, A.DBC_COL_NM, A.BIZ_AREA_ID, B.FULL_PATH, A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID, GET_USER_NM(A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID) AS BR_CRGP_USER_NM, A.AGR_NV, A.GL_NV, A.USE_YN, A.CNT_SQL, A.ER_CNT_SQL, A.ANA_SQL, A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TGTDB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, A.TGT_DB_SCH_ID, TGTS.DB_SCH_PNM, A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM, A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, A.TGT_CNT_SQL, A.TGT_ER_CNT_SQL, A.TGT_ANA_SQL, 'CU', A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS ,SYSDATE, #{reqmst.rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM WAM_BR_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON A.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG TGTDB ON A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = TGTDB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND TGTDB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND TGTDB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH TGTS ON A.DB_SCH_ID = TGTS.DB_SCH_ID AND TGTS.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND TGTS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
WHERE A.BR_ID IN
#{item.brId}
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C' , 'U')

INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT 'BRA' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,'0' AS VRF_SNO
,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAQ_BR_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'BRA' AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} --검증쿼리 and B.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.BR_NM = #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} --미존재시에만 INSERT.. AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.VRF_DTL_CD = #{vrfDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE 1=1 AND RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_BR_MSTR B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO )
